official_title: To temporarily extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.
short_title: Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007

summary.text: Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007 - Amends the Higher Education Extension Act of 2005 to extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965 through September 30, 2007.

titles.title: Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007
To temporarily extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.
